name: Phobos-Deimos
description:
Phobos-Deimos

Phobos-Deimos is a short horror game made in under 2 weeks as a submission to Horror Jam - Space

Story

You are going to be the first person that stepped foot on Mars. You are excited. And finally, the rocket will take off. But there's a slight problem; there were errors in the calculations and you don't have enough fuel to return home. So as a last hope you start to roam the place hoping to find something to make fuel with. Suddenly you see skyscrapers, you run there and find a ghost city. Now you should find fuel without getting hurt by any possible danger.
